headline: Is Northrop Grumman (NOC) Still Attractive After Its Strong Multi‑Year Share Price Run?
summary: If you are wondering whether Northrop Grumman's current share price fairly reflects its value, or if the market is getting ahead of itself, this article is designed to help you frame that question clearly. The stock last closed at US$689.75, with returns of 0.1% over 7 days, 12.8% over 30 days, 17.8% year to date, 48.6% over 1 year, 59.0% over 3 years and 146.7% over 5 years. This provides useful context before you weigh up what you are paying today. Recent attention on Northrop Grumman has...

headline: Northrop Grumman’s New Defense Deals Deepen Semiconductor And Training Exposure
summary: Northrop Grumman (NYSE:NOC) secured a new U.S. defense contract with a ceiling of up to $25b to accelerate military grade semiconductor technology. The company also won a separate $249m contract to supply Joint Threat Emitter systems for international defense customers. These awards expand Northrop Grumman's role in U.S. semiconductor capability and advanced threat simulation for allied military training. For investors tracking NYSE:NOC, these contracts arrive with the shares at $689.75 and...
